trans-unit.source: Add an image to the content element.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar in maletg a l'element da cuntegn.
Destinaziun da la colliaziun dal maletg

trans-unit.source: A custom image link target will override the lightbox link, so the image cannot be viewed fullsize anymore.
trans-unit.target: Ina colliaziun persunalisada che surscriva la colliaziun da lightbox, uschè ch'il maletg na po betg pli vegnir contemplà en la versiun gronda.
Configuraziun da la colliaziun da maletgs

trans-unit.source: Please select a file or folder from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna ina datoteca u in ordinatur da la structura d'ordinaturs.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter an alternate text for the image (alt attribute).
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar in text alternativ per il maletg (attribut alt).

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the image dimensions and the resize mode.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir las dimensiuns dal maletg ed il modus da midar grondezza.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left margin.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti inditgar ina distanza per sura, dretg, sut e sanester dal maletg.

trans-unit.source: Please specify how to align the image.
Here you can enter a short text that will be displayed below the image.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar in curt text che vegn visualisà sut il maletg
